DOC.brief_title: Persistence Protective Antibody Titers 12-24 Months After NmVac4-A/C/Y/W-135-DT Vaccination : Follow Up Study
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study collect serum sample evaluate duration protection NmVac4-A/C/Y/W-135-DT , base titer determine Serum Bactericidal Assay human complement ( hSBA ) . This assay use evaluate immunogenicity meningococcal vaccine , surrogate efficacy . A titer ≥ 1:8 consider protective . Objectives evaluate duration protective antibody titer NmVac4-A/C/Y/W-135-DT four serogroups , determine subject low titer , ≥:8 retain protective level antibody 12-24 month . Participants trial # JN-NM-002 , seroconverted serogroups A C contact ask provide blood sample 12-24 month vaccination NmVac4-A/C/Y/W-135-DT™ . Serum Bactericidal Assays perform evaluated persistence protective antibody titer NmVac4-A/C/Y/W-135-DT four serogroups , determine subject seroconverted low titer retain protective level antibody ( titer ≥:8 ) 12-24 month vaccination .
